text: Hugh Crawford Smith (1846-1907) was an English businessman and Liberal Unionist MP for Tyneside from 1900 to 1906. His wife was Hannah Ralston Lockhart, and his son was Norman Lockhart Smith. == References == == Additional sources== *Craig, F.W.S. British Parliamentary Election Results 1885-1918 *Whitaker's Almanack, 1901 to 1906 editions *Leigh Rayments' Historical list of MPs ==External links== * portraits of Hugh Crawford Smith at npg.org.uk Category:Liberal Unionist Party MPs for English constituencies Category:UK MPs 1900–1906 Category:Politics of Tyne and Wear Category:1846 births Category:1907 deaths
title: Hugh Crawford Smith
